name: Get Slack messages for new FormCrafts responses
description:
Every time a new form is submitted in FormCrafts, a message will be sent to the specified channel or chat in Slack.

The template expects your form to have at least the following fields:
1. First Name
2. Last Name
3. Email
4. How Can We Help?

The template uses this [sample form](https://formcrafts.com/a/mrvcsfa).
